requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3470 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
